name: Gold Mine Pitfall Escape Dash
description:
In Gold Mine Pitfall Escape Dash, it's time to go for the gold! Navigate your miner through the gold mine, where there are many obstacles he needs to jump over. Digging for gold can be rewarding, but it can also be very dangerous, so watch out!

Do you have the good timing, and good decision making skills it will take to pass each level? Download now and find out!

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
